rows.label: tlk41100124_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Just looking at plants is so relaxing,
don't you think?

rows.label: tlk41100124_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I thought you might agree.
Let me tell you something useful.

rows.label: tlk41100124_01_msg0003
rows.name:
If you see a spot that glitters—
a rock formation, a tuft of grass, a tree
root—you should try examining it.

rows.label: tlk41100124_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Sometimes you can find stray
items that monsters have hidden
away.

rows.label: tlk41100124_01_msg0005
rows.name: You might find something pretty useful.

rows.label: tlk41100124_01_msg0006
rows.name:
Other times, though, you'll find a buried
treasure trove. When that happens,
you'll need special skills to unearth it.

rows.label: tlk41100124_01_msg0007
rows.name: The kind of skills some Blades possess.
